Tooltip: This activity gets all Queue Definitions from the specified folder. If no folder is provided, then it returns all Queues for the folder the current process is running in.

Arguments.Name: Filter
Arguments.Tooltip: OData filter string used as a query parameter. See OData 4 APIs for reference on how to build a filter.

Arguments.Name: QueueDefinitions
Arguments.Tooltip: Array of QueueDefinitionDtoâ€™s returned by API.

Arguments.Name: Folder
Arguments.Tooltip: Folder to search for Queues. If not specified, uses the current folder that the process is running within.
